Title: The Stupid Reason Entrepreneurs Think Debt Is Smart
Description:
Today, we’ll hear about: 

  • A business owner struggling to stop using debt as leverage 
  • A young husband and father wondering if he should sell his business and retire 
  • Why Dave Ramsey will never sell his business 
  • A business owner thinking about using debt to buy a building
